DOC.brief_summary: Background : Direct anterior approach hip ( DAA ) consider one promise minimally-invasive approach total hip arthroplasty ( THA ) . Purpose study analyse influence learn curve clinical radiographic outcome direct anterior approach ( DAA ) total hip replacement . Methods : The first 30 patient operate DAA ( group B ) compare 39 patient operated Hardinge approach ( group A ) . Peri-and postoperative complication , Harris Hip Score ( HHS ) , implant positioning , experience pain patient satisfaction evaluate mean follow-up 32 month .
